subject: Congratulation
body:
Congratulation
It is a great pleasure to inform you that y
ou emerged winner to the sum of 2,500,000.00 dollars which will be transfer through our Bank, United Bank for Africa - Africa's Global Bank as a release from United Nation to compensate scam victims
For more inquiries 
contact us 
through our Email Address  ( 
united_bank.of_africa@qualityservice.com
 ) 
with your Bank Account information
 :for your transfer. 
Yours faithfully,
Bank Director Dr. Dan Okeke UBA

subject: Re: Congratulation
body:
Dear Dr. Dan Okeke,

I am delighted to hear about this unexpected windfall. However, I would like to know more details about this compensation from the United Nations. Could you please provide me with more information on how I was selected and what the next steps are?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James
